element.title: Hello world
element.content: I am just going to be slacking off till this site completely takes off. GlassFish does kinda suck. Slow stuff.

element.title: A real haiku
element.content:
A sweet cherry pie, And a Good day buscuit, Makes my day.
Not a real haiku.

element.title: Kya pak raha hai :(
element.content: Chubby kya masti karti hai, pata hai kya? :P Plus, mujhe bohot pak raha hai. Likhne ko bhi :(

element.title: Tiffin me kya hai?
element.content:
Please open your tiffin. I am hungry. Plus, give me a writeup.
Denil: Have you heard Orion? It's such a melodious song. Especially the bass. Anuj: Overrated shit.

element.title: This is a test post!
element.content: And it looks like the final presentation!

element.title: I love this project!
element.content:
Anuj did it in three days? Can't believe it!!!
(Because I thought of it already)
